name: Meerkats watch
description:
As a meerkat, you watch the desert for sneaking enemies.

They come under cover, dressed with bushes or rocks. But you can detect them as they change location from one day to another.  (And sometimes they come very close!)

When you think a bush or a rock is in fact an enemy, throw a stone at it to make him flee.

Watch out!

Gameplay:
  • Click on any point on the map to throw a stone
  • You have 3 stones every day,
  • The game lasts 5 days 
  • You must find the 6 enemies before the end of the 5th day
  • Nothing allows to recognise a true obstacle from a disguised enemy. Except that enemies change location during the night  --> Detect the moves from one day to another.
  • Sometimes enemies are protected behind a true obstacle. Wait for the next day: they will probably move
